data.name: An Outlook of India &  the World post COVID-19
data.summary:
Talk on the Current situation around Covid-19
Sector wise analysis of what is happening

Government intervention - what does the government need to do to help start-ups?
T.V. Mohandas Pai advice to Start-up Founders

Funding challenges and thoughts on future funding cycles - how do founders plan for them?
T.V. Mohandas Pai thoughts and advice to Investors currently?
